H0.text: What was the name given to Barbary pirates who raided ships in the Mediterranean and the south European coast from bases on the north coast of Africa. Buccaneer

H1.text: What was the name given to Barbary pirates who raided ships in the Mediterranean and the south European coast from bases on the north coast of Africa. Privateer

H2.text: What was the name given to Barbary pirates who raided ships in the Mediterranean and the south European coast from bases on the north coast of Africa. Raider

H3.text: What was the name given to Barbary pirates who raided ships in the Mediterranean and the south European coast from bases on the north coast of Africa. Corsair

A4.text: Barbary corsair, Ottoman and Berber privateers operating from North Africa

A5.text: A corsair is a privateer or pirate

A6.text: Barbary corsairs, Barbary pirates, Ottoman corsairs, or naval mujahideen were mainly Muslim corsairs and privateers who operated from the North African coast

A7.text: They engaged in razzias, raids on European coastal towns and villages, mainly in Italy, France, Spain, and Portugal
